title: ❓ FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
intro: Select a question below to see the answer:

questions.question: Are these accounts legitimate?
questions.answer: Yes, all accounts are 100% legitimate and verified. We source them through official channels.

questions.question: How long does account transfer take?
questions.answer: Account transfers typically take 24 hours to complete once payment is confirmed.

questions.question: Can I access Verified account from anywhere?
questions.answer: Yes, you can access your account from anywhere in the world with our custom APK.

questions.question: Is the Creativity Rewards Program guaranteed?
questions.answer: Both Tiktok Shop for Creator and Creativity Rewards Programs are guaranteed

questions.question: Do you offer refunds?
questions.answer: We offer refunds within 15 days if there is a problem with the account

questions.question: How do I use the custom APK?
questions.answer: Download instructions and APK files are provided after purchase. Check <#1372024055376642180> for help.
